ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Have you thought about the sperm that you ejaculate?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Just consider (the semen) that you emit,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Did you ever consider the sperm that you emit?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So what is your opinion regarding the semen you discharge?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Do you not see the semen you emit.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Have you considered the seed you spill?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Have ye seen that which ye emit?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Have you thought about [the semen] that you discharge --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Have you considered the sperm that you emit?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Do ye then see?- The (human Seed) that ye throw out,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then tell Me (about) the human semen that you emit.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Have you thought about what (sperm) you ejaculate?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Have you seen what you ejaculate?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Have you seen that which you emit?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:58] Have you considered the sperm that you emit?, the sperm you spill in the wombs of women?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Have ye seen that which ye emit) in the wombs of women?
